alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 2:13AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ITAWAMBA...SOUTHERN TISHOMINGO AND SOUTHEASTERN PRENTISS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM CST... At 213 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairview, or 9 miles southwest of Red Bay, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Red Bay, Tishomingo State Park, Belmont, Mantachie, Tremont, Tishomingo, Sandy Springs, Fairview, Burton, Clay, Golden, Paden, Eastman, Dennis, Moores Mill, Bloody Springs, Bounds Crossroads, and Neil. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
